ing: 1 (.14 ounce) package sugar free instant lemonade powder
1 (12 fluid ounce) can white grape juice concentrate
des: "Every time I make this sweet, cool, refreshing punch everyone wants the recipe! Sounds crazy, but trust me, you will go back for more! Made with white grape juice, lemonade and cucumbers! So easy, sooooo yummy!"
ins: In a punch bowl, stir together the water, ice, lemonade powder and grape juice concentrate. Float slices of lemon and cucumber on top.
